channel.title: Elysium | Account modes | Boss pets | ironman | highscores
channel.description:
[center]Hello everyone! :cool: :D
Here to show you a brand new server called Elysium, i could go ahead and explain it to you, but why not just join us and give it a try yourself? Like Flame said, dont judge a book by its cover.
Forums - http://elysiumps.com/forums
Website - http://elysiumps.com
Here we have some features! ;) Many more to come, we are updating daily!
-IRONMAN mode
- Duel arena
-Boss pets
-Elite slayer tasks
-+ alot more
ACHIEVEMENTS!
Clue Scrolls just like the old days! Including ELITE CLUE SCROLLS!
BOSSES
- Chaos Elemental
-Godwars
-Barrelchest
-KBD
-Dagannoth Kings
-Kraken
-Mithril dragons
-Zulrah
-Callisto
-Venenatis
-Vet'ion
-Scorpia
-Giant sea snake
MINIGAMES
-Barrows
- Pest Control
- Jad Mini-game
- Duel arena
- Barbarian Assault
Media:
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5224991/accountmode.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5224994/banktabs.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5224995/barrows.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5224998/bosslog.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5224999/cave_kraken.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5225003/ironman.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5225005/kraken.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5225007/Mith_dragons.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5225008/wyverns.png[/img][/center]
